title: Venus Transit in the 4th House for Leo Ascendant
summary: Venus transiting the fourth house brings focus to home, comfort, and emotional security for Leo ascendants. Domestic harmony improves, and you may feel inclined to beautify living spaces or reconnect with family roots. Emotional needs seek softness and reassurance. While this phase supports peace at home and property-related comforts, balance is required to avoid complacency or excess spending on luxury. Nurturing inner calm becomes the real gain.

sections.heading: Finance
points: Spending on home or comfort rises

closing: This transit invites you to restore emotional balance. When comfort supports calm rather than excess, inner stability deepens.
